name: 1 Minute Warfare
description:
http://lengine.org/mw.html



Fight against the enemy tank using tactics in this 3D strategy game. Have lots of fun!

Trailer:

1 Minute Warfare is a turn-based strategy game with action elements where you will have to use a powerful tank to destroy the enemy.

Each of the two tanks has a limited supply of fuel so each round you will only be able to move for a short distance.

1 Minute Warfare is based on LEngine. It is shortened from "Lukin Engine" (eng. "Luka's Engine").

There are cool power-ups that you can use against your opponent. Some of them will be given from the starts while others, crates that fall randomly from the sky, must be collected.

Use the mouse to move and press spacebar to shoot your tank's cannon.

1 Minute Warfare is developed by Luka Ivankovic and Petar Mihalj. They are both 16 and it was originally project for Infokup competiton in software development.

Free to download
